AdvisorOS User Guide

Welcome to AdvisorOS, the comprehensive practice management platform designed specifically for Certified Public Accountants (CPAs) and their clients. This guide provides complete documentation for all user types and workflows.

[!TIP] New users should start with Getting Started for CPA firms or Client Portal Guide for clients.

📚 User Guide Categories

🏢 For CPA Firms & Practitioners

Complete guides for accounting professionals using AdvisorOS for practice management.

Guide Audience Purpose
Getting Started New Users Initial setup and orientation
Client Management All CPAs Complete client lifecycle management
Document Management All Users Document processing and organization
QuickBooks Integration Bookkeepers Financial data synchronization
Financial Analytics Advisors Business intelligence and reporting
Team Management Managers Staff and permission management
Workflow Automation Process Owners Automated workflow creation
Security & Compliance Administrators Security and regulatory compliance

👥 For Clients

Guides for CPA firm clients using the AdvisorOS client portal.

Guide Purpose
Client Portal Guide Complete portal usage instructions
Document Sharing Secure document exchange procedures
Financial Reports Understanding and accessing reports
Communication Messaging and collaboration tools

🎥 Video Tutorials

Visual learning resources for different user types and skill levels.

Tutorial Duration Audience
Platform Overview 15 min All Users
Setup Walkthrough 30 min Administrators
Advanced Features 45 min Power Users

🔧 Troubleshooting & Support

Self-service resources for resolving common issues and problems.

Resource Purpose
Common Issues Frequently encountered problems
Performance Optimization Speed and efficiency improvements
Integration Problems Third-party service issues

🚀 Quick Start Pathway

For New CPA Firms (5-Step Onboarding)

  1. 🏗️ Set up your organization: Create your CPA firm’s workspace and basic settings
  2. 📊 Import clients: Connect QuickBooks or manually add client information and structure
  3. 📁 Upload documents: Organize client documents with AI-powered categorization and OCR
  4. 👥 Invite team members: Add staff with appropriate access levels and permissions
  5. ⚙️ Configure workflows: Set up automated processes for common tasks and procedures

For Existing Users (Daily Workflow)

  1. 📈 Check dashboard: Review pending tasks, client updates, and system notifications
  2. 📋 Process documents: Handle new document uploads and review OCR results
  3. 💼 Update client records: Maintain current client information and engagement status
  4. 📊 Generate reports: Create and distribute financial reports and analytics
  5. 🤝 Communicate: Respond to client messages and team collaboration requests

For Clients (Getting Started)

  1. 🔐 Access portal: Log in using credentials provided by your CPA
  2. 📄 Upload documents: Submit required documents through secure upload system
  3. 📊 Review reports: Access financial reports and business insights
  4. 💬 Communicate: Send messages and questions to your CPA team
  5. 📱 Mobile access: Download mobile app for on-the-go access

📖 Feature Deep Dives

Core Platform Features

  • Multi-Tenant Architecture: Secure, isolated environments for each CPA firm
  • Client Portal: Branded client access with secure document sharing
  • Document Processing: AI-powered OCR and intelligent categorization
  • Financial Analytics: Real-time dashboards and business intelligence
  • Workflow Automation: Customizable processes and task management
  • Integration Hub: QuickBooks, Stripe, Azure, and third-party connections

Advanced Capabilities

  • Artificial Intelligence: Document classification, anomaly detection, predictive analytics
  • Mobile Applications: Full-featured iOS and Android apps with offline capabilities
  • API Framework: Comprehensive REST and GraphQL APIs for custom integrations
  • Security Framework: SOC 2 compliance, encryption, audit trails, and access controls
  • Reporting Engine: Custom report builder with advanced visualization options
  • Collaboration Tools: Team messaging, file sharing, and project management

🎯 User Personas & Workflows

Managing Partner

  • Focus: Strategic oversight, client relationships, business growth
  • Key Features: Executive dashboard, revenue analytics, client portfolio overview
  • Typical Workflow: Morning dashboard review → Client status updates → Team performance metrics

Senior CPA/Manager

  • Focus: Client delivery, team management, quality assurance
  • Key Features: Client management, workflow automation, team coordination
  • Typical Workflow: Task assignment → Quality review → Client communication → Progress tracking

Staff Accountant

  • Focus: Data entry, document processing, basic client tasks
  • Key Features: Document upload, data entry, task completion, time tracking
  • Typical Workflow: Document processing → Data validation → Task completion → Status updates

Bookkeeper

  • Focus: Financial data entry, reconciliation, transaction processing
  • Key Features: QuickBooks integration, transaction management, reconciliation tools
  • Typical Workflow: Data sync → Transaction review → Reconciliation → Report generation

Client

  • Focus: Document submission, report access, communication with CPA
  • Key Features: Client portal, document upload, report viewing, messaging
  • Typical Workflow: Document upload → Status checking → Report review → Question submission

📱 Platform Access Options

Web Application

  • URL: Your organization’s custom subdomain (e.g., yourfirm.advisoros.com)
  • Requirements: Modern web browser (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge)
  • Features: Full platform functionality with responsive design
  • Best For: Desktop work, complex tasks, administrative functions

Mobile Applications

  • iOS App: Available on App Store for iPhone and iPad
  • Android App: Available on Google Play Store for Android devices
  • Features: Core functionality optimized for mobile use
  • Best For: On-the-go access, document scanning, quick status checks

API Access

  • REST API: Standard HTTP endpoints for custom integrations
  • GraphQL: Flexible query language for efficient data retrieval
  • Authentication: JWT tokens with role-based access control
  • Best For: Custom applications, third-party integrations, automation

🆘 Getting Help & Support

Self-Service Resources

  • Knowledge Base: Comprehensive articles and tutorials
  • Video Library: Step-by-step visual guides and training materials
  • FAQ Section: Answers to frequently asked questions
  • Community Forum: User discussions and peer support

Direct Support Channels

  • Email Support: support@advisoros.io (response within 24 hours)
  • Phone Support: 1-800-ADVISOR (business hours: 8 AM - 6 PM EST)
  • Live Chat: Available in-app during business hours
  • Priority Support: Available for Professional and Enterprise plans

Training & Onboarding

  • New User Training: Complimentary onboarding sessions for new organizations
  • Advanced Training: Specialized training for power users and administrators
  • Webinar Series: Regular feature updates and best practice sessions
  • Custom Training: On-site or virtual training tailored to your firm’s needs

📋 Success Metrics & Best Practices

Key Performance Indicators

  • User Adoption: Percentage of staff actively using the platform
  • Document Processing: Volume and accuracy of OCR document processing
  • Client Engagement: Client portal usage and satisfaction scores
  • Workflow Efficiency: Time savings from automated processes
  • Data Quality: Accuracy and completeness of financial data

Best Practices for Success

  1. Start with core workflows: Implement basic client and document management first
  2. Train thoroughly: Ensure all users complete appropriate training modules
  3. Customize gradually: Add custom workflows and integrations over time
  4. Monitor usage: Track adoption metrics and address user concerns promptly
  5. Gather feedback: Regular check-ins with users to identify improvement opportunities

📅 Updates & Release Notes

Release Cycle

  • Major Releases: Quarterly with significant new features
  • Minor Releases: Monthly with enhancements and bug fixes
  • Security Updates: As needed with immediate deployment
  • Feature Flags: Gradual rollout of new capabilities

Staying Informed

  • Release Notes: Detailed change documentation for each release
  • Email Notifications: Important updates sent to administrators
  • In-App Announcements: New feature introductions and tutorials
  • Webinar Updates: Live demonstrations of new capabilities

This user guide is continuously updated to reflect the latest platform features and capabilities. For the most current information, always refer to the online documentation at docs.advisoros.com.
